uk.co.silentsoftware.core.attributestrategy

Interface GigaScreenAttributeStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GigaScreenBrightPaletteStrategy, GigaScreenHalfBrightPaletteStrategy, GigaScreenMixedPaletteStrategy

    public interface GigaScreenAttributeStrategy
    Represents the screen-attribute distribution strategy by providing a pre-calculated per-attribute palette of 4 Gigascreen colours. I.e. a GigaScreenAttribute palette entry of 4 colours is intended to represent an attribute block distributed across two screens.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GigaScreenAtrribute[] getPalette()
      Retrieves an attribute palette based on GigaScreen palette strategy e.g both screen brights would be one strategy.

    • Method Detail

      • getPalette

        GigaScreenAtrribute[] getPalette()
        Retrieves an attribute palette based on GigaScreen palette strategy e.g both screen brights would be one strategy.
